content: The banking industry is nothing but a rigged system and banking executives have no business earning that kind of money to begin with. The lack of oversight on these white collar criminals is a crime in itself. I'm disgusted these criminals never go to prison.And what about the fleeced customers and the employees driven to illness or who have lost their jobs because of the dishonesty of the banking industry? May God help us all now that there will be no regulations on this greedy and dishonest profession.
